column4: hwllo!i have a tv tuner card. how can i find if its compartible with linux and if yes how can i operate it?
hwllo!i have a tv tuner card. how can i find if its compartible with linux and if yes how can i operate it?
do you know the chipset it's based on?
cat /proc/bus/pci/devices may give you some more detailed info about your card (i'm sure there is a better way, anyone?)
